decks.notes: This deck focuses on using aggressive creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler, Delver of Secrets, and Murktide Regent to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It also includes a range of spells like Lightning Bolt, Brainstorm, and Force of Will to control the game and protect its own creatures. The deck aims to apply pressure from the start and disrupt the opponent's plans with counterspells and removal, while utilizing efficient card filtering and mana denial strategies to maintain its tempo advantage.

This Dimir Tempo deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Nihil Spellbomb, while also utilizing efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Daze. The deck aims to control the tempo of the game by countering key spells with Force of Will and applying pressure with threats like Murktide Regent and Orcish Bowmasters. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage while cards like Ponder and Brainstorm help dig for key cards. The deck also includes a land destruction package with Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base.

The deck aims to use a combination of artifacts and mana acceleration to quickly assemble a game-winning combo using Mystic Forge and Manifold Key. By utilizing cards like Grim Monolith, Lotus Petal, and Karn, the Great Creator, the deck can generate significant amounts of mana and card advantage to power out its combo pieces. The inclusion of cards like The One Ring and Glaring Fleshraker provide additional synergies and win conditions, making the deck a powerful and versatile contender in the Legacy format.

The main concept of this UR Aggro Legacy deck is to quickly and aggressively apply pressure on the opponent utilizing efficient creatures and tempo spells. The deck aims to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining a fast clock with cards like Delver of Secrets, Murktide Regent, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Lightning Bolt. The deck also utilizes disruptive elements like Daze and Wasteland to keep the opponent off balance, while also providing card advantage with cards like Ponder and Brainstorm.

The deck revolves around using Mystic Forge to manipulate the top of the library and cast artifacts for free. It combines powerful artifacts like Karn, the Great Creator and Urza's Saga with mana acceleration from cards like Grim Monolith and Lotus Petal. The goal is to assemble pieces of the combo and generate an overwhelming advantage in card advantage and board presence. This deck aims to establish a dominant board state quickly while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Pithing Needle and Tormod's Crypt.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combo between Nomads en-Kor and Nadu, Winged Wisdom to create a powerful engine for card draw and mana generation. It also includes support cards like Swords to Plowshares and Green Sun's Zenith to control the board and search for key pieces. The deck aims to quickly assemble the combo pieces while controlling the opponent's resources with counter spells and removal, ultimately overwhelming them with a large amount of card advantage and mana advantage to secure a win.

The main focus of this Combo - Painter deck is to utilize Grindstone and Painter's Servant to mill cards from the opponent's library, ultimately decking them out for the win. By combining these cards with support from Goblin Welder, Goblin Engineer, and Urza's Saga, the deck can efficiently assemble its win condition. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Pyroblast and Ensnaring Bridge to control the battlefield, while cards like Phyrexian Devourer and Phyrexian Dragon Engine provide alternative win conditions. Overall, the deck aims to quickly and decisively execute its combo strategy to secure victory.

Utilizing a combination of graveyard recursion and efficient interaction, this deck aims to quickly reanimate powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier to overwhelm opponents. The deck includes plenty of card selection and disruption, such as Thoughtseize and Force of Will, to protect the combo and disrupt opponent's game plans. With a mix of control elements and explosive reanimation plays, this deck is designed to be versatile and adaptable against a variety of strategies in the Legacy format.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays and tempo advantage, utilizing cheap and efficient creatures and spells to pressure the opponent while disrupting their game plan. It aims to quickly build a board presence and maintain control of the game by utilizing counterspells and removal spells to protect its threats. The deck also includes cards that can help filter draws and dig for key pieces to ensure consistency in its aggressive strategy. Overall, the deck aims to win the game in a fast and efficient manner through proactive plays and smart decision-making.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back onto the battlefield to overwhelm the opponent. It also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo. The strategy is to efficiently control the game until the combo can be set up and win with the high-impact creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty.Mana denial with Wasteland and disruption with Daze are also key components of the deck.

This deck focuses on deploying efficient creatures like Noble Hierarch and Knight of the Reliquary to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Collector Ouphe and Wasteland. Green Sun's Zenith allows for toolbox flexibility, fetching necessary creatures for the situation. Key cards like Gaddock Teeg and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben limit the opponent's options, while cards like Endurance and Karakas provide disruption against graveyard strategies and problematic legendary creatures. The deck aims to outpace the opponent with early aggression and disruption to secure victory.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combination using Mystic Forge to play artifacts from the top of the library. It includes various key pieces such as Grim Monolith and Mox Opal to generate mana, with cards like Tormod's Crypt and Pithing Needle for disruption. The goal is to generate a strong board presence through artifact synergy, ultimately leading to a game-winning play using cards like Karn, the Great Creator or Tezzeret, Cruel Captain. The deck's main strategy revolves around leveraging artifacts and mana acceleration to overwhelm opponents and secure victory.

The main idea of this UWx Control deck is to establish early game control through cards like Thoughtseize, Swords to Plowshares, and Force of Will, while also generating card advantage and selection with Brainstorm, Ponder, and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan, protect its own threats like Murktide Regent and Teferi, Time Raveler, and eventually grind out a win with powerful synergies and versatile removal options. The mana base is carefully crafted to support the deck's triple-color requirements and maximize consistency in casting its spells.

This deck focuses on using ninjas to quickly deal damage to the opponent while also disrupting their strategy with cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will. The combination of creatures like Yuriko and Kaito, along with removal spells like Fatal Push and Murderous Cut, creates a fast-paced and aggressive gameplay style. The deck also includes cards like Baleful Strix and Brazen Borrower for additional utility and flexibility. Overall, the goal is to control the game early and pressure the opponent to secure a swift victory.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on utilizing various creatures with strong abilities and efficient removal spells to aggressively attack the opponent's life total. The inclusion of cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Guide of Souls helps provide a quick clock while Goblin Bombardment provides additional reach to close out games. With a mix of disruption from cards like Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize, and mana denial from Wasteland, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on using cards like Entomb and Reanimate to quickly bring powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty or Atraxa, Grand Unifier onto the battlefield. By combining combo pieces with control elements like Force of Will and Thoughtseize, it aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up its own win condition. The deck also utilizes cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Murktide Regent for card advantage and pressure. Overall, the strategy revolves around efficiently reanimating threats and overwhelming the opponent with a powerful board presence.
